headline.main: NEW SUCCESSES GROWN THE ARMS OF THE SOVIET FORCES; Russian

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 31 (AP) -- The midday communique of the Soviet Information Bureau as recorded by the Soviet Monitor:
abstract: USSR repts surrender of Field Marshal von Paulus and other gens, Stalingrad area; forces take Ryazansk; rept fall of Byeloryechinsk on Armavir-Tuapse ry and Klyuch near Krasnodar; continue Voronezh front offensive; list booty; encircle Gers east of Kastornoe; map
snippet: LONDON, Jan. 31 (AP) -- The midday communique of the Soviet Information Bureau as recorded by the Soviet Monitor:...
